body.name: Yoobure Bookshelf Small Book Shelf, Solid Industrial 3 Tier Shelf Bookcase, Short Book Case for Bedroom, Living Room, Office Home, Small Spaces, Easy Assembly Berry Brown
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 52 mins
features: ✨【Minimalist & Elegant Design】:Enhance the style of your space with our 3-tier small bookshelf! The wood grain panel and black alloy frame create a striking visual contrast, showing a minimalist and elegant design that complements any home decor.

✨【Stability & Durability】:The premium wood board, the square alloy tube support and the X-type reinforcement alloy tube of this bookshelf on the back ensure the entire bookshelf's stability and durability. Adjustable foot pads also further enhance stability. (Holds up to 100 lbs for each layer of shelf)

✨【Generous Storage Capacity】:Make the most of your limited space with our L15.7"*W11.8"*H27.6" 3-tier bookshelf. It has 3 open shelves with bottom and middle tiers measuring 10.6" in height providing ample space to display your favorite books, photos, or decorative items of various sizes. While the top tier is open for storing larger items.

✨【Versatile Standing Shelf】:The small shelf stand is designed in a simple style that complements any decor. Can be used as a small bookcase, display shelf, storage shelf, and more, making it a perfect addition to your home office, study, living room, bedroom, and beyond. Not only stand alone but also be paired with one or more of the standing shelves.

✨【Assembling is A Breeze!】:All necessary tools for the bookshelf are included, all the components are clearly marked with numbers and come with detailed instructions that guide you through the installation process step by step, making it a hassle-free experience. Also can check out the assembly instruction video on the page for added guidance.

💖【Worry-Free Warranty】:We're proud of our book shelves and stand behind their quality with a worry-free warranty and excellent after-sales service. Buy with confidence and add our narrow bookshelf to your home today! It also makes a thoughtful housewarming gift for your loved ones.

What are the dimensions of the 3 shelf bookcase? The size of the rustic bookshelf is L15.7" x W11.8" x H27.6", with a layer height of 10.6" for the bottom and middle tiers. The compact design is perfect for small spaces while providing ample storage. Is this hard to assemble? This office shelf is easy to install, with all necessary tools and instructions included in the package. Also the assembling video is on the page for further installation guidance What is the material of the table leg? Crafted with a sturdy square alloy tube support frame, which ensures durability and stability, and is not easy to rust. So Yoobure metal bookshelf is built to last! Can it only be used as a low bookshelf? Certainly not. 3 tier shelf is perfect for any room in your home, this shelf is a versatile addition to your decor. Whether you're looking for a storage shelf, display shelf, bookshelf, nightstand, or side table. How stable is this etagere bookcase? Yoobure bookshelf is made of premium wood and thick alloy frame with a black paint finish. The additional X-crossbar makes the structure more stable and durable. The 4 adjustable footpads provide extra stability on uneven floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have to rave about these!
reviews.reviewText: These came the day after I ordered them. I needed small shelves to fit under my window. Not able to find one single unit in the right size, I settled on these, and how lucky I was! These are perfect. They arrived really well packed. They are really sturdy. The shelves are flawless on each side, so it doesn't matter which side you put up. These were so easy to assemble. I made a mistake on the first one, so that one took an hour. The second one took me about 45 minutes. I have the black and white and the white isn't a bright white. It's more of a soft white (but not cream, still definitely white) that looks great with all my decor. The softer white color of the shelf actually makes it look more expensive. I am just so impressed with how sturdy these are, how great they look and how easy they were to assemble, all at a really good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and handsome
reviews.reviewText: This shelf was super easy to put together, took me less than an hour. It came with a small real screwdriver for assembly, which is now my kitchen junk drawer screwdriver, so now my husband can have all of his tools back in his toolbox. The shelf is sturdy and compact. Fits in the small space I needed it for and compliments the darker hardwood aesthetic we have in our living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for what I was looking for. Holds my books! Easy to assemble. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value and price
reviews.reviewText: The shelves are nice looking and fairly easy to put together. However, I personally didnt have enough strength in my hands to get the screws into the shelves. That part required a power tool. Other than that, assembly was easy,. They look nice in my bedroom and match my existing furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and useful
reviews.reviewText: The only drawbacks were the directions that missed one helpful diagram (but easily corrected), and the wood was slightly dinged in shipping.Overall it was easy to put together, with the tools being included. It is attractive and sturdier than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Perfect
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly and fits like a glove in my office... perfect for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute lil bookshelf 🥰🥰
reviews.reviewText: It was easier to follow the assembly via YouTube. I’m not one to comprehend the pictures and arrows only. I prefer at least some written directions so I had to watch the video once, then I assembled it easily. It came out just as pictured and perfect to hold my books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, very pleasantly surprised
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice, sturdy bookcase. A great value for the money. I would expect it to cost at least twice as much as I paid for it. Very easy to assemble. One thing that is odd but not really a disappointment -- the wood grain is faux. Once you're done putting it together, no one will know unless you tell them. I'm really glad I ordered this bookcase.
